comment.body:
**Настройки • Safari • Очистить историю и данные**
Это действие и раньше помогало для пропущенной рекламы в браузере, а то, что это сработает для приложения, даже не подумал. 
Вам стоит рассмотреть способ вынести этот совет на видное место (чтобы было меньше ненужных запросов). Спасибо

comment.body:
> Thank you for your answer. @ilvjyw Could you please add these rules:
> 
> ```
> huaban.com#@#img[width="240"][height="400"]
> huaban.com#@#img[width="240px"][height="400px"]
> ```
> 
> to user rules and then check if issue still occurs?
This rule is working in theory！
#130277 There are not my question 
Just help you reproduce

issue.title: mpfoto.eu
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://mpfoto.eu](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmpfoto.eu) ### Comment Username: @juhacz > From today, i.e. 09/24/2022, from 02:39:07 Adguard Home started blocking the mpfoto.eu website. I suspect this happened after updating the filters. I manually downloaded the easylist.txt list which is the basis for blocking the page, but I did not find any string that would be responsible for this blocking. I am the owner of this domain, only what this site does is redirect the customer to my private OLX sales account and it has been for several years. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/vtXy2wn.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/DDJLTaP.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | AdguardHome v0.107.13 Browser: | Chrome Filters: | Ad Blocking:
EasyList

Security:
NoCoin Filter List

Other:
AdGuard DNS Custom filters: | AdAway Default Block List,
POL: Polish filters for Pi hole,
WindowsSpyBlocker - Hosts spy rules,
Official Polish Filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard

issue.title: yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: www.bricodepot.ro
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Ublock Origin with AdGuard Annoyance

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

www.bricodepot.ro

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

After I open the website, a grey window appear.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
